citation: “Performing the Archive: leaf leaf/s by Daphne Marlatt” from Inspired Word Cafe Live Reading by Daphne Marlatt, 19 September, 2019. Released: 2019. Genre: Poetry Reading. The SoundBox Collection.
label: Mediation and Lived Experience - Daphne Marlatt Performs With Her Younger Self

children.text: In 2018, Canadian poet Daphne Marlatt reads poems alongside a recording of her younger self in 1969. Transcripts and editorial notes by Emily Murphy and Karis Shearer.
